channel.title: Omfg, peeps, pro's, help me please! :S
channel.description:
hello everyone, ive got some questions. they are:
1. how do i change the amount of a item in a shop? 2. how do i change the price of a item in the shop? 3. how do i change the max hit of a item? 4. on the most clients i saw the admins+ have a bank with the most items like 2147 times or sumthing. how ill add this :confused:
please help me

item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

For questions 1-3, its in player.java, find it out yourself.

For four, you do this buy doing ::pickup then the item code and amount.
